name: Pertussin
relationship: Compare: DROSERA; CORALLIUM; CUPRUM; NAPHTHAL; MEPHITIS; PASSIFLOR; COCCUS CACTI; MANGES. PHOS.
details: Taken from the glairy and stringy mucus containing the virus of whooping-cough. Introduced by John H. Clarke for the treatment of whooping-cough and other spasmodic coughs. Whooping-cough when symptoms return again after being allayed.
